name: EnvisaLink-DSC
description: Accesses a DSC PowerSeries alarm panel through an EnvisaLink EVL-3/4 to allow ISY 994i to control alarm functions and respond to events.

credits.title: envisalink-poly: a Polyglot NodeServer for the EnvisaLink EVL-3/4 device (DSC)
credits.author: W. Randy King (Goose66)
